thread.section_title: Homestay.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Homestay.com | homestay.com
thread.title: Roberto Amatuzzi

author: Roberto Amatuzzi
title: Roberto Amatuzzi
text:
I found Homestay.com when I was searching for rooms in Iran, which is not covered by Airbnb. I was reluctant at first, but as I navigated through the site, I became more confident. Three highlights: (i) Trustworthy, which is key in this business, (ii) direct contact between guests and potential hosts brings flexibilty (on dates for instance), (iii) coverage (Iran is a great example).
I have booked three stays so far and I couldn't be happier with the experience.
